title: Alexander De Croo - Wikipedia
snippet: De Croo was born in Vilvoorde and studied business engineering at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel before attaining an MBA at Northwestern University in the United States. He worked for Boston Consulting Group before starting his own company, Darts-ip, in 2006.

title: Alexander De Croo

title: Alexander De Croo | ITIF
snippet: Graduated in Business Engineering, Alexander De Croo completed an MBA at the Kellogg School of Management (Northwestern University) in Chicago (United States), in 2004. Between 1999 and 2006, he was employed as a strategy consultant at The Boston ...
